projects.title: Self-Hosted Media Server â€“ Automated DVD Archival & Streaming
projects.description: Built a self-hosted media server from scratch using a headless Ubuntu install via bootable USB and ISO. Automated the entire DVD ripping and archival process with Docker, including metadata tagging, renaming, and structured file organization. Integrated an open-source streaming platform for local media access, and developed a custom CLI tool for effortless media ingestion based on title, season, and episode input.

projects.title: YYC Food Trucks - Employee & Event Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive full-stack capstone project for food truck operations management. Implemented features including employee scheduling, event coordination, shift tracking, and real-time availability monitoring. Built with modern web technologies and a focus on scalability and user experience.

projects.title: Rollin' in Dough
projects.description: Developed a sweet e-commerce platform for a local baker. Now cookie lovers can order their fix 24/7.

projects.title: No Cap Cafe
projects.description: Developed with a team of 4, a comprehensive restaurant management system that handles everything from table assignments to inventory tracking and reporting.

projects.title: Noize
projects.description: Collaborated on a music streaming platform my focus was on the UI, dynamic search functionality, secure login, and the song display page with functionality.
